name: Rodeo Roundup
description: Saddle up and experience the excitement of a real rodeo! Test your skills on our mechanical bull and feel like a true cowboy.

name: Bucking Bronco
description: Hold on tight as you ride our wild Bucking Bronco! Experience the thrill of a rodeo ride without leaving the park.

name: Wild West Train Ride
description: Hop aboard our Wild West train and journey through the rugged landscapes of the Old West. Keep an eye out for bandits along the way!

name: Cowboy Campfire
description: Gather 'round the campfire and listen to tales of the Old West from our seasoned cowboys. Roast marshmallows and enjoy the warmth of the fire.

name: Gold Rush Mine
description: Explore the depths of our Gold Rush Mine and search for hidden treasures. Watch out for surprises around every corner!

name: Cowboy Carousel
description: Ride our Cowboy Carousel and choose your trusty steed for a spin! Gallop around to the sounds of classic country tunes.

name: Frontier Log Flume
description: Embark on a splash-filled journey down our Frontier Log Flume! Brave the rapids and take in scenic views of the Wild West.
